objects.text:
• Instantly Absorbs Oil & Controls Shine
• Reduces Pores & Prevents Breakouts
• Hydrates Without Heavy Feeling

With Sweet Orange Peel, Citronella Oil & Silica
Paraben-Free & Cruelty-Free

product_details.description: ABSORBS OIL AND CONTROLS SHINE INSTANTLY— You never again have to be embarrassed by shiny, oily skin. This formula has silica, which immediately absorbs excess oil and diffuses light, leaving a natural matte finish on your face or bald head. REDUCES ACNE, BLACKHEADS, AND LARGE PORES — Sweet orange peel extract unclogs skin, leaving pores free of the gunk that causes blackheads and breakouts. Pores shrink to normal size and are less visible. Silica also helps remove toxins. HYDRATES WITHOUT HEAVINESS — Citronella extract softens and glycerin locks in moisture, leaving skin hydrated without being greasy or heavy. Skin becomes balanced; especially good for combination skin where you have oily and dry patches. An outstanding makeup primer. FREE OF ALL THE BAD STUFF — The last thing your skin needs is gunk. That’s why Instant Fix Oil Control is free of parabens, phthalates, GMOs, DEA, and triclosan. It’s also allergy and dermatologist tested, and made cruelty free in the USA. FAVORITE WITH GROOMING EXPERTS— Anthony brand men’s grooming products have been featured (and won awards) in top publications, including Men’s Health, New York Times, Forbes, GQ, and Esquire. We’re also in 850 high-end barber shops across US and Canada. Brand - Anthony ** Item Volume - 90 Milliliters ** Item dimensions L x W x H - 1.69 x 1.06 x 5.79 inches ** Age Range (Description) - Adult ** Special Feature - Not Tested On Animals, Hypoallergenic, Natural Ingredients **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a bold and modern promotional layout for a men's skincare product. The left side of the design is dedicated to key textual information, segmented into multiple text layers including a bold uppercase **heading ("heading")**, a smaller supporting **subheading ("subheading")**, and a **description block ("description")** featuring bulleted benefits. Below that is an ingredient and feature **tagline ("tagline")**, followed by a clearly emphasized **price tag ("price")**. At the bottom, there's an eye-catching peach-colored **call-to-action button ("cta_button")** with a centered **button label ("cta")**. The right side is dominated by a centered product **image ("product_image")**. The background features a dual-tone dark color split with decorative wavy strokes and semi-transparent circular accents.

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Charcoal (#1E1E1E)
- Dark Grey (#262626)
- Medium Grey (#333333)
- Light Grey (#E0E0E0)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Peach/Coral (#FFA07A)
- Transparent accents (#444444 at 20% opacity)
product_color: The product image uses a sleek, modern color palette to emphasize clarity and functionality. The primary colors are matte black (#1A1A1A), crisp white (#F4F4F4), vibrant red (#D32F2F), and neutral grey (#B0B0B0). Black dominates the tube, providing a strong, premium feel, while white is used on the label area to create contrast and improve text legibility. Red is strategically placed to highlight important words like “Objective” and part of the logo, creating visual interest. The text uses tonal grey and black, blending smoothly with the background while maintaining readability. This palette yields a professional, clinical, and minimalistic aesthetic ideal for skincare ads.
